name: letter
room_description: There is letter located on the floor here.
look_description: The paper itself is stained, so badly that it is almost unreadable. The only things you can make out are the date - October 28, 1903, and a couple of lines at the bottom: 'I will spend the rest of my life in repentance. She told me it was for the rats'. The letter is signed by Dr. Peters. What happened here?

read.text: The paper itself is stained, so badly that it is almost unreadable. The only things you can make out are the date - October 28, 1903, and a couple of lines at the bottom: 'I will spend the rest of my life in repentance. She told me it was for the rats'. The letter is signed by Dr. Peters. What happened here?

touch.text: The paper is old and crumbling. You are worried it will disintigrate in your fingers.

smell.text: The paper smells like mold and dust.
